com.airs.handlerUIs

Interface HandlerUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AIRS_general_settings, AudioHandlerUI, BeaconHandlerUI, CalendarHandlerUI, DeviceInfoHandlerUI, EnvironmentalSensorsUI, EventButtonHandlerUI, HeartMonitorHandlerUI, LocationHandlerUI, MediaWatcherHandlerUI, NotificationHandlerUI

    public interface HandlerUI
    Interface being implemented by individual HandlerUI classes for each configuration setting entry

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String About()
      Returns the About String shown when selecting the About menu item in the Options menu
      String AboutTitle()
      Returns the Title for the About Dialog shown when selecting the About menu item in the Options menu
      void configurePreference(PreferenceActivity prefs)
      Function to configure the Preference activity with any preset value necessary
      void destroy()
      Destroys any resources for the handlerUI
      HandlerEntry init(Context context)
      Initialises the settings entry with the name, description and icon resource ID
      int setDisplay()
      Returns the resource ID to the preference XML file containing the layout of the preference

    • Method Detail

      • init

        HandlerEntry init(Context context)
        Initialises the settings entry with the name, description and icon resource ID
        Parameters:
        context - Reference to the Context realising this entry

      • setDisplay

        int setDisplay()
        Returns the resource ID to the preference XML file containing the layout of the preference
        Returns:
        resource ID

      • About

        String About()
        Returns the About String shown when selecting the About menu item in the Options menu
        Returns:
        About String of the About text

      • AboutTitle

        String AboutTitle()
        Returns the Title for the About Dialog shown when selecting the About menu item in the Options menu
        Returns:
        String of the title

      • configurePreference

        void configurePreference(PreferenceActivity prefs)
        Function to configure the Preference activity with any preset value necessary
        Parameters:
        prefs - Reference to PreferenceActivity

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroys any resources for the handlerUI
